response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I estimate its worth to be $15,000 to me. Considering its high quality and potential impact on your projects, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This represents a substantial saving for you, while still allowing me to recover my investment and ensure a fair profit. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you require any additional information to make a decision.", "product_price": 12000}
